thread.title: India Seeks Death Penalty for Rape of Girls Under 12

author: wsjcom
title: India Seeks Death Penalty for Rape of Girls Under 12
text:
India’s government on Saturday prescribed the death penalty for people convicted of raping children under 12 to help combat an increase in violent crime against women.
An ordinance was approved by Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Cabinet and was being sent to the president for approval, the Press Trust of India news agency reported.

The ordinance...
